paragraphs.text:
case class Flight(YEAR: String, MONTH: String, DAY: String, DAY_OF_WEEK: String, AIRLINE: String, FLIGHT_NUMBER: String, TAIL_NUMBER: String, ORIGIN_AIRPORT: String, DESTINATION_AIRPORT: String, SCHEDULED_DEPARTURE: String, DEPARTURE_TIME: String, DEPARTURE_DELAY: String, TAXI_OUT: String, WHEELS_OFF: String, SCHEDULED_TIME: String, ELAPSED_TIME: String, AIR_TIME: String, DISTANCE: String, WHEELS_ON: String, TAXI_IN: String, SCHEDULED_ARRIVAL: String, ARRIVAL_TIME: String, ARRIVAL_DELAY: String, DIVERTED: String, CANCELLED: String, CANCELLATION_REASON: String, AIR_SYSTEM_DELAY: String, SECURITY_DELAY: String, AIRLINE_DELAY: String, LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY: String, WEATHER_DELAY: String) extends Serializable {}
case class Airport(IATA_CODE: String, AIRPORT: String, CITY: String, STATE: String, COUNTRY: String, LATITUDE: String, LONGITUDE: String)

msg.data:
defined class Flight
defined class Airport

paragraphs.title: Create Case Classes

paragraphs.text:
// # File location and type
    val file_location = "file:///home/suket/Documents/FlightData/flights.csv"
    val file_type = "csv"

    // # CSV options
    val infer_schema = "false"
    val first_row_is_header = "true"
    val delimiter = ","

msg.data:
file_location: String = file:///home/suket/Documents/FlightData/flights.csv
file_type: String = csv
infer_schema: String = false
first_row_is_header: String = true
delimiter: String = ,

paragraphs.text:
// # The applied options are for CSV files. For other file types, these will be ignored.
    val flights = (spark.read.format(file_type)
      .option("inferSchema",infer_schema )
      .option("header", first_row_is_header)
      .option("sep", delimiter)
    //   .schema(customSchema)
      .load(file_location).as[Flight])

paragraphs.title: Print Schema

paragraphs.text:
// Create a Dataset containing flights with delayed departure by more than 15 min using "filter"
val delayedFlights = (flights
                        .select("AIRLINE", "DEPARTURE_DELAY")
                        .filter($"DEPARTURE_DELAY" > 15))
                        
delayedFlights.show()

paragraphs.title: Apply a filter to find flights delayed more than 15 min

paragraphs.text:
val numTotalFlights = flights.count()
val numDelayedFlights = delayedFlights.count()

// Print total number of delayed flights
println("Percentage of Delayed Flights: " + (numDelayedFlights.toFloat/numTotalFlights*100) + "%")

msg.data:
numTotalFlights: Long = 5819079
numDelayedFlights: Long = 1018558
Percentage of Delayed Flights: 17.503767%

paragraphs.title: Display percentage of delayed flights
Create a UDF to determine delays

paragraphs.text:
val flightsWithDelays = flights.select($"YEAR", $"MONTH", $"AIRLINE", $"FLIGHT_NUMBER", $"ORIGIN_AIRPORT", $"DEPARTURE_DELAY", 
                    isDelayedUDF($"DEPARTURE_DELAY").alias("IsDelayed"))
                    
flightsWithDelays.show(5)
paragraphs.title: Create a new DataFrame with IsDelayed column

paragraphs.text: flightsWithDelays.agg((sum("IsDelayed") * 100 / count("DEPARTURE_DELAY")).alias("Percentage of Delayed Flights")).show()
paragraphs.title: Calculate percentage of delayed flights using flightsWithDelays DataFrame

paragraphs.text:
(flights.select("ORIGIN_AIRPORT", "DESTINATION_AIRPORT", "TAXI_IN")
        .groupBy("ORIGIN_AIRPORT", "DESTINATION_AIRPORT")
        .agg(avg("TAXI_IN")
        .alias("AVG_TAXI_IN"))
        .orderBy(desc("AVG_TAXI_IN"))
        .show(10))
paragraphs.title: Find Avg Taxi-in
Find Avg Taxi-Out
paragraphs.text:
(flights.select("ORIGIN_AIRPORT", "DESTINATION_AIRPORT", "TAXI_OUT")
        .groupBy("ORIGIN_AIRPORT", "DESTINATION_AIRPORT")
        .agg(avg("TAXI_OUT")
        .alias("AVG_TAXI_OUT"))
        .orderBy(desc("AVG_TAXI_OUT"))
        .show(10))

// Convert flights DataFrame to a temporary view
flights.createOrReplaceTempView("flightsView")

paragraphs.title: Compare Total Number of Delayed Flights by Carrier
paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
--- Compare Total Number of Delayed Flights by Carrier
SELECT AIRLINE, SUM(isDelayedUDF(DEPARTURE_DELAY)) AS NumDelays FROM flightsView GROUP BY AIRLINE

%spark.sql
--- Compare Total Delayed Time (min) by Carrier
SELECT AIRLINE, SUM(DEPARTURE_DELAY) AS TotalTimeDelay FROM flightsView GROUP BY AIRLINE

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Compare Total Delayed Time (min) by Carrier

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
--- Find Average Distance Travelled by Carrier
SELECT AIRLINE, avg(DISTANCE) AS AvgDistanceTraveled FROM flightsView GROUP BY AIRLINE ORDER BY AvgDistanceTraveled DESC

paragraphs.title: Find Average Distance Travelled by Carrier

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql

SELECT DAY_OF_WEEK, CASE WHEN isDelayedUDF(DEPARTURE_DELAY) = 1 THEN 'delayed' ELSE 'ok' END AS Delay, COUNT(1) AS Count
FROM flightsView
GROUP BY DAY_OF_WEEK, CASE WHEN isDelayedUDF(DEPARTURE_DELAY) = 1 THEN 'delayed' ELSE 'ok' END
ORDER BY DAY_OF_WEEK

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql

SELECT CAST(DEPARTURE_TIME / 100 AS INT) AS Hour, CASE WHEN isDelayedUDF(DEPARTURE_DELAY) = 1 THEN 'delayed' ELSE 'ok' END AS Delay, COUNT(1) AS Count
FROM flightsView
GROUP BY CAST(DEPARTURE_TIME / 100 AS INT), CASE WHEN isDelayedUDF(DEPARTURE_DELAY) = 1 THEN 'delayed' ELSE 'ok' END
ORDER BY Hour

paragraphs.text:
%spark

import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

// Save and Overwrite our new DataFrame to an ORC file
flightsWithDelays.write.format("orc").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).save("flightsWithDelays.orc")
paragraphs.title: Save to ORC file
Load back from an ORC file

paragraphs.text:
%spark

flightsWithDelays.write.format("orc").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).saveAsTable("flightswithdelaystbl")
paragraphs.title: Save DataFrame as Permanent Table

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql

SHOW TABLES

-- Note that flightsWithDelaysTbl is a permanent table instead of a temporary view!
